title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 4 - How to Patch a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Patching a leak in a lay flat header pipe
subtasks: Identify the location of the leak
Cut the lay flat header pipe exactly over the leak
Prepare the coupling or bob splice fitting
Secure the pipe with clamps
Insert the bob splice fitting into both sides of the pipe
Align and push the separated pipe parts over the fitting
Apply lubricant (e.g., Vaseline or vegetable oil) to facilitate sliding
Adjust the clamps past the barbs and tighten them using a screwdriver
Verify the repair by turning the water on
Maintain the irrigation system by performing regular repairs (as demonstrated in the video)
